completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

completeListOfAbilities.name: Lifeshaver
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit 土 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 15% of own MAX HP
Self: 3 turns Beast Teachings
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Lifeshaver) for 3 turns、 HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Lifeshaver) for 3 turns after use
Cannot use Cat Scratch for 3 turns after use

ailments.name: Beast Teachings
ailments.desc: Beast Teachings: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK、 SPD

completeListOfAbilities.desc: 土 magic BRV attack + HP attack\nIncreases BRV based on BRV damage dealt

completeListOfAbilities.name: Cat Scratch
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Group 土 magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack
Self: 3 turns Beast Teachings
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Cat Scratch) for 3 turns、 HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Cat Scratch) for 3 turns after use
Cannot use Lifeshaver for 3 turns after use

ailments.name: Beast Teachings

completeListOfAbilities.name: Beast Raid

Self: 8 turns Feral Youth

ailments.name: Feral Youth
ailments.desc: Feral Youth: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

completeListOfAbilities.name: Lifeshaver
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit 土 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 35% of own MAX HP
Self: 3 turns Beast Teachings

ailments.name: Beast Teachings
ailments.desc: Beast Teachings: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK、 SPD

completeListOfAbilities.name: Lifeshaver
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
5-hit 土 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Slightly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 15% of individual MAX HP
Self: 6 turns Beast Teachings
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Lifeshaver) for 3 turns、 HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Lifeshaver) for 3 turns after use
Cannot use Cat Scratch、 triggers Counter (Lifeshaver) (2-hit 土 magic BRV attack; grants party BRV based on BRV damage dealt; moderately restores party's HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP) when ally hit with any BRV attack or HP attack for 3 turns after use

ailments.name: Beast Teachings
ailments.desc: Beast Teachings: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK、 SPD

ailments.name: 1st Gau Counterattack Buff
ailments.desc: 1st Gau Counterattack Buff

passives.name: Lifeshaver Extension
passives.desc:
When using Lifeshaver:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • HP restored based on HP damage dealt extended to party
 • Beast Teachings duration +3
 • Triggers Counter (Lifeshaver) (2-hit 土 magic BRV attack; grants party BRV based on BRV damage dealt; moderately restores party's HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP) when ally hit with any BRV attack or HP attack for 3 turns after use

When using BRV Attack+ (Lifeshaver):
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • BRV increased based on BRV damage dealt extended to party

When using HP Attack+ (Lifeshaver):
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • BRV increased based on BRV damage dealt extended to party
passives.short_desc: Lifeshaver Extension: Boost to Lifeshaver

passives.name: Beast Teachings Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK while Beast Teachings active
passives.short_desc: Beast Teachings Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Cat Scratch Extension
passives.desc:
When using Cat Scratch:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Beast Teachings duration +3
 • Triggers Counter (Cat Scratch) (2-hit group 土 magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target) when ally hit with any BRV attack or HP attack for 3 turns after use

When using BRV Attack+ (Cat Scratch):
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

When using HP Attack+ (Cat Scratch):
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
passives.short_desc: Cat Scratch Extension: Boost to Cat Scratch

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Stone Enchant Extension
passives.desc: When using Stone Enchant:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises own ATK
passives.short_desc: Stone Enchant Extension: Boost to Stone Enchant

passive.name: Stone Enchant Growth
passive.short_desc: Stone Enchant Growth: Boost to Stone Enchant

passive.name: Monster Behavior
passive.desc:
When using Cat Scratch:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Beast Teachings boost

When using BRV Attack+ (Cat Scratch):
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target

When using HP Attack+ (Cat Scratch):
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
passive.short_desc: Monster Behavior: Boost to Cat Scratch

passive.desc: May equip EX ability Beast Raid
passive.short_desc: Living in Nature: May equip Beast Raid

passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Beast Raid
passives.short_desc: Mighty Beast Raid: Increases BRV damage dealt with Beast Raid

passives.name: Beast Raid Debuff Plus
passives.desc: When using Beast Raid:\n • All targets: 4 turns 土 Resist Down from first HP attack
passives.short_desc: Beast Raid Debuff Plus: Inflicts 土 Resist Down from first HP attack when using Beast Raid

passives.name: Beast Raid Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Beast Raid
passives.short_desc: Beast Raid Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Beast Raid

passive.name: Living in Nature Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Beast Raid
passive.short_desc: Living in Nature Extension: Boost to Beast Raid

passives.name: Beast Raid Force++
passives.desc:
When using Beast Raid:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack++ (2-hit 土 magic BRV attack; change to BRV Attack+ (Lifeshaver)、 BRV Attack+ (Cat Scratch) takes priority over BRV Attack++)

HP Attack becomes HP Attack++ (土 magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; change to HP Attack+ (Lifeshaver)、 HP Attack+ (Cat Scratch) takes priority over HP Attack++)
passives.short_desc: Beast Raid Force++: Boost to Beast Raid

passives.name: Living in Nature Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Force Nails (VI)+ or passive ability Living in Nature Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Living in Nature Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Beast Raid Buff Starting
passives.desc: At start of quest:\n • Self: 8 turns Feral Youth
passives.short_desc: Beast Raid Buff Starting: Feral Youth at start of quest

passives.name: Beast Raid BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Beast Raid:\n • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Beast Raid BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Beast Raid
